article.title: December 2012 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The December 2012 Galaxy Update is now available.

Highlights:

  • 37 new papers
  • Two new public Galaxy Servers
  • Open Positions at seven different institutions
  • Upcoming Events and Deadlines
  • Source Code Documentation is now available
  • New Galaxy Distributions
  • New Galaxy CloudMan Release
  • Tool Shed Contributions
  • Other News

If you have anything you would like to see in the January Galaxy Update, please let us know.

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
